title: Spiritual Intelligence Development Program for Improving Research Outcomes in Higher Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational research methodologies and academic writing proficiency
context.additional_context: Targeting graduate-level language research, aiming to produce research outcomes while utilizing simulation/VR learning environments feasible in limited-technology settings (smartphone-centric)

learning_goals: Learners can increase the number of research presentations by 20% compared to baseline by applying the four core elements of spiritual intelligence (critical thinking, self-awareness, empathetic understanding, social responsibility) to research activities
Learners can improve research problem-solving efficiency by 15% using spiritual intelligence training modules in VR-based simulation environments

Learners can design three language learning effectiveness measurement indicators using mixed methods (survey + qualitative interviews), apply them to an actual research project (e.g., language education program evaluation), and write a results report.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
